introduction.title: Intro to Audience Filters
introduction.intro: An Audience is a group of shoppers that can be reached by a particular medium.

behaviour-filters.title: Behaviour Filters
behaviour-filters.intro: Behavioural filters allow you to target your audience based on an event that has taken place, such as a visited page on your website.

location-filters.title: Location Filters
location-filters.intro: Location filters allow you to target your audience based on a geographical location.

language-filters.title: Language Filters
language-filters.intro: Target audiences based on language preferences.
